data.question: Is Justin Bieber known for his work in country music?
data.correct_fact: Justin Bieber is known for his work in pop and R&B music.

data.question: Is Dwayne Johnson famously known as 'The Rock'?
data.correct_fact: Dwayne Johnson is famously known by his wrestling name 'The Rock'.

data.question: Was Adele primarily known for her contributions to rock music?
data.correct_fact: Adele is primarily known for her contributions to pop and soul music.

data.question: Was Whitney Houston's 'I Will Always Love You' a number-one hit?
data.correct_fact: Whitney Houston's 'I Will Always Love You' was a number-one hit on the Billboard Hot 100.
